DataElement.preferredName: Patient Reported Outcome Oral Symptoms Burning Sensation Assessment Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A psychometric scale (0-10, with 0 being No stinging or burning and 10 being Worst stinging or burning possible) for information regarding the Patient Completed Oral Symptoms assessment of a burning or stinging sensation, collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptoms, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Reported Outcome Oral Symptoms Burning Sensation Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information on the Patient Completed Oral Symptoms assessment of a burning or stinging sensation, collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptoms, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Information collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptons, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

Concepts.definition: Information collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptoms, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

Property.preferredDefinition: Of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth.:Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.:A sensation of stinging or heat, not necessarily accompanied by redness or physical signs of irritation.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth.
Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.
A sensation of stinging or heat, not necessarily accompanied by redness or physical signs of irritation.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement._Text; the words of something written.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.

ReferenceDocuments.name: On a scale from 0 to 10, what
ReferenceDocuments.description: On a scale from 0 to 10, what number best describes any STINGING OR BURNING FROM THE ORAL RINSE now? (circle one number)
